title: Google\Cloud\CloudDms\V1\VpcPeeringConnectivity
name: VpcPeeringConnectivity
description:
The details of the VPC where the source database is located in Google Cloud.

We will use this information to set up the VPC peering connection between Cloud SQL and this VPC.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.clouddms.v1.VpcPeeringConnectivity

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.vpc
params.description: The name of the VPC network to peer with the Cloud SQL private network.
